author: penguin person12

text: Ahhh, I remember that the first half of this track tended to play whenever I was working so hard to finish what I was working on, like my castle. The second half reminds me of when the sun set, I ran back to my little hut, slept in my bed, and was ready and eager to start working again. This wasn't too long ago, but they're still fond memories.

text: Oh.. It's this one. I remember this being the first piece I heard in Minecraft. When I'm lost in the cave, the light and airy tune reassured me that I will get out alive and has inspired me to do what I can to survive. It pushes me to do the best I can.
author: Aero Novara

text: Love this Track (as i love all the others of the Minecraft OST)
author: Niar

text: Another great track from C418. The first half is mostly ambient with some classic Minecraft piano, but it's the second half that really made me notice this theme. It has a great playful rhythm to it. Minecraft definitely has one of my favorite ambient soundtracks in recent memory.
